amendment.description: To substitute the substantive text of S. 1916, but without the restriction on the maximum premium chargeable for SBP participation initiated by enrollment during the special period of open enrollment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3315 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3315 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S7090-7092) To substitute the substantive text of S. 1916, but without the restriction on the maximum premium chargeable for SBP participation initiated by enrollment during the special period of open enrollment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3315 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3315 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
